top_stories.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
top_stories.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff
top_stories.content: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

top_stories.title: CrowdStrike, Uber, Zoom Among Industry Pioneers Building Smarter Agents With NVIDIA Nemotron and Cosmos Reasoning Models for Enterprise and Physical AI Applications
top_stories.description: AI agents are poised to deliver as much as $450 billion from revenue gains and cost savings by 2028, according to Capgemini. Developers building these agents are turning to higher-performing reasoning models to improve AI agent platforms and physical AI systems. At SIGGRAPH, NVIDIA today announced an expansion of two model families with reasoning capabilities Read Article
top_stories.author: Kari Briski
top_stories.content: AI agents are poised to deliver as much as $450 billion from revenue gains and cost savings by 2028, according to Capgemini. Developers building these agents are turning to higher-performing reasoning models to improve AI agent platforms and physical AI systems. top_stories.title: Inline code nodes now supported in Amazon Bedrock Flows in public preview
top_stories.description: We are excited to announce the public preview of support for inline code nodes in Amazon Bedrock Flows. With this powerful new capability, you can write Python scripts directly within your workflow, alleviating the need for separate AWS Lambda functions for simple logic. This feature streamlines preprocessing and postprocessing tasks (like data normalization and response formatting), simplifying generative AI application development and making it more accessible across organizations.
top_stories.author: Shubhankar Sumar
top_stories.content: We are excited to announce the public preview of support for inline code nodes in Amazon Bedrock Flows. With this powerful new capability, you can write Python scripts directly within your workflow, alleviating the need for separate AWS Lambda functions for simple logic. This feature streamlines preprocessing and postprocessing tasks (like data normalization and response formatting), simplifying generative AI application development and making it more accessible across organizations.

top_stories.title: FieldAI Raises $405M to Scale Embodied AI Robotics
top_stories.description: Backing from Bezos Expeditions, Canaan Partners, Khosla Ventures, Prysm, Temasek, and others to accelerate commercial expansion of first risk-aware foundation models for robotics FieldAI, a leader in physical AI and robotic autonomy, today announced that it has raised $405 million in two consecutive rounds. Investors include Bezos Expeditions, BHP Ventures, Canaan Partners,... The post FieldAI Raises $405M to Scale Embodied AI Robotics first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
